roleset.name: to hide feelings/motives by pretense
roleset.note: DISSIMULATE-V NOTES: Created by Claire (from dissimulate.01-v)

role.descr: motives, feelings, etc. hidden by arg 0

example.name: Transitive
example.text: Like children who-1 *T*-1 are incapable of *PRO*-1 dissimulating their basic wants and needs, Michael's manner of being in the world is uncensored and spontaneous.
